name: smart-img-resize
description: Efficiently resize images in the browser with smart crop and aspect/ratio capabilities
author: Buzut (buzut.net)

scripts.prepare: test -d .git && cd .git/hooks/ && curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Buzut/git-emojis-hook/master/commit-msg && curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Buzut/git-emojis-hook/master/prepare-commit-msg && chmod +x * || exit 0
